description:
Arima and Yukino are separated from one another by training camp over Summer Vacation. An unexpected phone call from Arima makes Yukino`s heart beat faster. Asaba, meanwhile, bored because Arima isn`t around, shows up at Yukino`s house, where Tsukino and Kano make him welcome. Hiroyuki, their father, is not at all happy with this development, however.
Source: theTVDB.com

titles.title: Kore made no Ohanashi (Kouhen) / Koe no Mukou ni Mieru Mono
The Story So Far (Part 3) / What Can Be Seen Beyond That Voice
これまでのお話 (後編) / 声の向こうに見えるもの
